name: Survival-Escape Sea Submarine
description:
background story
You woke up in a Soviet submarine on the seabed, and the rest of the submarine disappeared. What happened here? How can you escape in the face of difficulties?
Game features
1. A wide variety of interactive props
Dozens of available items can help you through the storm.
2. elaborate level puzzles
Thirty levels, each level has different puzzles, the levels of difficulty are progressive, and each level gives you a new experience of “ship”.
3. Original hand-painted scenes
The unique game screen gives you a different visual enjoyment.
4. Easy to understand level tips
Is the difficulty too high? It doesn't matter, we also provide you with intimate tips.
5. User-friendly game interaction design
The vertical operation mode allows you to take out your mobile phone at any time, whether on the subway, on the bus, or when you go to the toilet.

Love the puzzle, just come and play "Escape the Horror Submarine"!
